body_html: The C++ code uses 32 bit integer so the number would overflow at 2G. If we want to just use hard limit, we can either remove coded_stream.SetTotalBytesLimit call or we can put the largest 32-bit integer in the limit.
body_text: The C++ code uses 32 bit integer so the number would overflow at 2G. If we want to just use hard limit, we can either remove coded_stream.SetTotalBytesLimit call or we can put the largest 32-bit integer in the limit.
body: The C++ code uses 32 bit integer so the number would overflow at 2G. If we want to just use hard limit, we can either remove coded_stream.SetTotalBytesLimit call or we can put the largest 32-bit integer in the limit.
